A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was absolutely the worst Star Wars movie.  I thought TFA was bad..  this goes beyond that. So many pointless scenes\, horrible plots and what they did to Luke Skywalker is pretty painful for 30 to 50 year olds that helped keep this franchise so popular through the decades. Absolutely a punch in the stomach.  Good riddance Disney and Star Wars. Don't care anymore.
